subject: Re: The '470 mod.
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Frank,
You may have to get to that second circuit board and see which wire is 
connected to the MUTE solder tab. I traced mine out, as show in the 
video, which was that green wire.  I'm guessing if they didn't stick 
with a standard color coded bundle with each radio, the color may be 
different.
Once you take off the top circuit board you'll see where the bundle 
terminates and you can see which is labeled MUTE.
- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
>
> 
> That didn't work! It's got two green wires!
>  
>  Frank-S
